name: YLEmojiRating
summary: Use YLEmojiRating to improve your Appstore rating.
description: Use YLEmojiRating to improve your Appstore rating. YLEmojiRating shows a view where the users rates the app in emojis (counted as 1-5 stars) and gets redirected either to the mail client (1-3 stars) or Appstore (4-5 stars).
